page.title: 14SHOPPING IN LEYBURN
page.content: The area is well served for shopping. In Leyburn there is a good selection of shops both food and non-food. The nearest large town where branches of multiple stores are to be found is at Darlington which is twenty two miles distance. There is a weekly market held in Leyburn on Friday of each week. This is always a bustling scene throughout the year. The number of extra visitors in the summer months does creat traffic problems on Market Day. Regular shoppers in Leyburn come from an area of ten miles radius. It would be correct to say that no one shop has a monopoly - all businesses have competition from other traders.
